name: Plekthora
description:
Classic horizontal space themed shooter for the Commodore-64.  Features three different and upgradeable weapons, couch coop and 20 levels of simple shooting pleasure.

  • Generous placement of power ups and bonus lives
  • Score multiplier for hyperinflated high scores
  • Tested on real stock C64 hardware from the days ... but works fine on all modern emulators too
  • Single .prg file, no fancy fake retro multi megabyte cartridge
  • Uncompressed code, ideal for modding, cheating or recreational reverse engineering

C64 PAL mode only.
